name: Fishy Bouncy
description:
Welcome to Fishy Bouncy! (I have no creativity)

Keep the fish bouncing as long as possible until you catch it! The further you get, the faster they fall and bounce! But also the smaller your platform gets!

My best friend has always been obsessed with playing the fishing minigames when playing anything. He refuses to do anything else.
So I thought I'd make him a game solely focussed on fishing. Something fun, something challenging, something...like this?

I had a fun time making this game. I made it in about 10 hours and then started adding and tweaking things. I'd love to add more if anyone wants me to!
